description: Arima Kishou is a classmate of http://anidb.net/ch76474 [Taishi], http://anidb.net/ch76471 [Aki] and http://anidb.net/ch76473 [Minami]`s, as well as undercover Ghoul Investigator. He was assigned to deal with Lantern in 13th Ward. During the fight with Lantern, Taishi learned about his involvement with Doves and agreed to help him in order to avenge his http://anidb.net/ch76472 [friend]`s death. Later on, Minami joined the team and helped out gathering clues about Ghouls.
name: Arima Kishou
